|elevation_m = |area_code = |website = |footnotes = }} 'Bar' (, also Romanized
as 'BÄr') is a village in Firuzeh Rural District, in the Central
District of Firuzeh County, Razavi Khorasan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census,
its population was 4,103, in 968 families.
